description:
LATEST: Course is up to date for December 2014.

Join over 600 successful students who conquered their fear of public speaking using hypnosis!

Would you like to eliminate your fear of public speaking?

Would you like to be able to relax and reduce stress or anxiety in front of others?

Would you like to feel comfortable and motivated?

Would you like to release negativity and feel happy?

Then "Public Speaking Made Easy using Hypnosis" is for you!

Learning Objectives:

at the end of the course, students will be able to...

  • Eliminate the fear of public speaking!
  • Enjoy speaking in front of others!
  • Experience hypnosis and go under more easily in the future!
  • Feel more relaxed and comfortable than ever before!
  • Develop skills leading to increased happiness and reduced stress!

"How do I know this will work?"

Based on years of research, this course uses modern psychological techniques that will automatically create feelings of relaxation.

You will learn how to transform your life from a place of stress and anxiety to a place of peace, relaxation and comfort.

The hypnosis experience will help you to control fear, decrease stress and bring more joy, power and happiness to everything you do.

"Why should I listen to you?"

Ryan M. Mancinelli, M.A. is a leading life coach, instructor, hypnotist, HR expert and organizational psychologist. He has used his unique talents in personal transformation with actors, athletes, doctors, business professionals, musicians and more. His goal is to provide knowledge and assistance to people across the globe. He wishes to help mankind become successful, quit smoking, lose weight, overcome insomnia, conquer stress, and increase self-confidence and positivity. He currently works for IBM as part of the Leadership Development Program as a Human Resources Consultant.

What students are saying...

"As we consistently grow and work towards are goals we need to constantly be fed knowledge that helps us along the path. This is a well structured the course that will assist in your growth." - Kip Ferguson

"I like the passion of the instructor. The course is nicely organized." - Alex Genadinik

Click the "Take This Course" button on the top right of the screen because the sooner you get started, the sooner you'll become successful!

Scroll up and Enroll Now!
title: Public Speaking Made Easy using Hypnosis!
